text: 16 Savage Memes Everyone Who's Ever Watched ` ` Grey's Anatomy'' Will Understand By Katie Louise - Smith'' Watch Grey's Anatomy they said ; it'll be fun they said.'' Can you make it through this list without having an emotional breakdown?
